item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Due to Lauren having Laryngitis we have changed the date to OCT 16th.

Performing Live....... Lauren Bateman this Saturday Night at 9:00 pm.

Lauren Bateman is a Singer, Guitarist, Song writer and NOW one of the stars in the up and coming TV reality show BIKER CHICZ.

Lauren's song, Guardian Angel, was selected by the Minnesota Association of Christian Songwriters for their Songs Your Mother Should Hear Contest. The selection includes radio airplay as well as free national and international distribution.

Lauren was selected as one the few artists that will performed at this year's Chick Singer Night in Boston. Now in it's 20th year nationally and 6th year in Boston, it is the nation's original and longest running songfest for female artists.

For more info and to hear her music go to www.LaurenBateman.com

Then stay and dance the night away and meet some very nice women.

Great DJ that will be mixing her R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

DUE TO THE WEATHER, WE HAVE MOVED THE PARTY INSIDE, BUT PART OF THE PATIO IS STILL OPENED.


• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Fire Place
• Premium Liquor
• (FREE FOOD)
• POOL TABLES
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: Lauren Bateman performing LIVE @ The Hide Away
